name: Fighting Eyes
overview: Fighting Eyes is an fighting game developed by Bandit and published by Solan - two companies who would go on to have no further involvement in the games industry - released in Japan in 1998. Features an odd assortment of characters (including a young boy in a clown outfit), downright primitive graphics, and decidedly awkward fighting gameplay, the game has gone largely forgotten outside of compilations of hilariously awful fighting games / kusogē titles.
